name: Twitter
tagline: Security Event  Capturing and  Tracking from Twitter Data
body:
### Capturing and Tracking fromTwitter Data.
A framework will be developed to capture emergent events in the information security domain from
Twitter data. Recently, different types of malwares, bugs and phishing attacks are detected on the
internet. The framework is expected to predict the novel attacking technique which can help users to
prevent being infected.

### Authors and Contributors

1. Fatma Emül (@fatma11)
2. Havvanur Şahin (@havvanursahin)
3. Kübra Aydin (@kubra94)
4. Yasemin Kılıç (@yaseminkilic)
